#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
int main()
{int a[100][100],i,j,n,p,q,t;
vector<int> v1,v2;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{cin>>n;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
for(j=0;j<n;j++)
cin>>a[i][j];
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{int s1=0,s2=0;
for(j=0;j<n;j++)
{s1+=a[i][j];
s2+=a[j][i];}
if(s1%2==1){
v1.push_back(s1%2);
if(v1.size()==2)
break;
p=i;}
if(s2%2==1){
v2.push_back(s2%2);
if(v2.size()==2)
break;
q=i;}
}
int x=v1.size();
int y=v2.size();
if(x==0&&y==0)
cout<<1<<endl;
else if(x==1&&y==1)
cout<<"("<<p+1<<","<<q+1<<")"<<endl;
else
cout<<0<<endl;
v1.clear();
v2.clear();
}
return 0;
}
